subject: NEW Object instance
msgSnippet: Hi, How can we verify, using JUnit if an object is really created, if a new operator is used to instantiate an object. Thanks, -Kamal. [Non-text portions of
messageBody:
Hi,

How can we verify, using JUnit if an object is really created, if a "new"
operator is used to instantiate an object.

Thanks,

-Kamal.
